title: FSA Student Aid Estimator - User Data
description: User data required to execute the FSA Student Aid Estimator wizard and calculate federal student aid eligibility

state_residence.description: Student's state of legal residence (full name, e.g., 'Illinois')

college_grade_level.description: Student's grade level for 2026-27 school year

has_dependents.description: Does the student have children or other dependents they support?

circumstance_active_duty.description: Student is currently serving on active duty or is a veteran (optional, appears when has_dependents is 'no')

circumstance_orphan.description: Student was an orphan since turning 13 (optional, appears when has_dependents is 'no')

circumstance_foster_care.description: Student was in foster care or ward of court since turning 13 (optional, appears when has_dependents is 'no')

circumstance_emancipated.description: Student is/was a legally emancipated minor or in legal guardianship (optional, appears when has_dependents is 'no')

circumstance_homeless.description: Student is unaccompanied and homeless (optional, appears when has_dependents is 'no')

circumstance_none.description: None of the special circumstances apply (optional, appears when has_dependents is 'no')

parent_marital_status.description: Parent's marital status (may be pre-selected based on parents_married)

parent_state_residence.description: Parent's state of legal residence (full name, e.g., 'Illinois')

family_size.description: Total number of people in student's family, including the student

parent_filed_taxes.description: Did the student's parent file taxes in 2024?

parent_adjusted_gross_income.description: Parent's adjusted gross income in dollars (conditional - required if parent_filed_taxes is 'yes')

parent_total_assets.description: Parent's total assets in dollars, including cash, savings, investments, real estate (not home) (conditional - required if parent_filed_taxes is 'yes')

parent_child_support_received.description: Annual child support received by parent in dollars (conditional - required if parent_filed_taxes is 'yes', enter 0 if none)

student_filed_taxes.description: Did the student file taxes in 2024?

student_adjusted_gross_income.description: Student's adjusted gross income in dollars (conditional - only if student_filed_taxes is 'yes')

student_total_assets.description: Student's total assets in dollars (conditional - only if student_filed_taxes is 'yes')
